name: Notes (GucioDevs)
description:
A game for practicing Notes.

Controls:

Press a key on the screen, if it matches the current note, you will get a point and the game will continue to the next note.

Ctrl + Alt = Toggle Fullscreen.

Update 1: Changed the word Key to Clef.

Update 2: Changed the key H to B.

By @GucioDevs.
